comment:
* Utility for building indented strings. * *

This is a wrapper for {@link StringBuilder} for appending strings with indentation. The * indentation level can be increased by calling {@link #increaseIndentLevel()} and decreased by * calling {@link #decreaseIndentLevel()}. * *

Indentation is applied after each newline character for the given indent level. * * @hide

variables.name: mIndentNext
variables.comment: Indicates whether next non-newline character should have an indent applied before it.

methods.name: public IndentingStringBuilder increaseIndentLevel()
methods.comment: Increases the indent level by one for appended strings.

methods.name: public IndentingStringBuilder decreaseIndentLevel() throws IllegalStateException
methods.comment: Decreases the indent level by one for appended strings.

methods.name: public IndentingStringBuilder append(@NonNull String str)
methods.comment:
* Appends provided {@code String} at the current indentation level. * *

Indentation is applied after each newline character.

methods.name: public IndentingStringBuilder append(@NonNull Object obj)
methods.comment:
* Appends provided {@code Object}, represented as a {@code String}, at the current indentation * level. * *

Indentation is applied after each newline character.

methods.name: private void applyIndent()
methods.comment: Adds indent string to the {@link StringBuilder} instance for current indent level.

methods.name: private void applyIndentToString(@NonNull String str)
methods.comment:
* Applies indent, for current indent level, after each newline character. * *

Consecutive newline characters are not indented.
